plot: There is a bar for Das Gemeinen, where each day, each night, tale after tale of woe spills forth from men pitted against each other and the world. This is one of those tales.
title: Felt
plot_es: There is a bar for Das Gemeinen, where each day, each night, tale after tale of woe spills forth from men pitted against each other and the world. This is one of those tales.
plot_en: There is a bar for Das Gemeinen, where each day, each night, tale after tale of woe spills forth from men pitted against each other and the world. This is one of those tales.
